page.title: 15Health in Wash Common
page.content: In our block there are no doctors, dentists or hospitals so people have to go into Newbury. We carried out some surveys on the parents of children in our class and found that only 4 people have been to hospital in the last year and only 2 people in the last week. Only 7 adults surveyed have been to the doctors in the last year, 6 in the last month and 4 in the last week. In our area we are fairly healthy. Most people went to the dentists every 6 months. This week the school dentist visited us and looked at all the childrens teeth. If there was anything wrong, we had to take a note home. No children in our class had to take a note home. We also found that most children were vaccinated against measles, whooping cough, diptheria and polio.
